system.description: When you act against the Prophecies, roll +Courage.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: Breaking causality has consequences. The Overlord will tell you one way that defying the Prophcy has changed things for the worse.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
You have changed the future. Tell us one part of the Prophecy that has changed and what will happen now as a result.

Breaking causality has consequences. The Overlord will tell you one way that defying the Prophcy has changed things for the worse.

success.label: Success!
success.value: You have changed the future. Tell us one part of the Prophecy that has changed and what will happen now as a result.
